Trigger.Name: 9 No mat/inventory
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}00:[^:]+:Unable to craft\. (?<Unable2>Insufficient inventory space|You do not have the required materials|You have not selected all of the materials)

ConditionSingle.ExpressionR: You do not have the required materials
You have not selected all of the materials

Trigger.Name: 9 Durability 00:0839
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<Thing>^.{15}00:[^:]+:The condition of your(?<GearName>.*) (?<Durability>has dropped to 10|is now 0))

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: food finished ending craft ${var:ReuseFoodN} food used

Action.DiscordWebhookMessage: <@142044173640531968> reused Food ${var:ReuseFoodN} times, and I think <@142044173640531968> crafted ${var:ItemN} times ${var:ItemN2}.
Action.UseTTSTextExpression: food finished ending craft ${var:ReuseFoodN} food used
